original_title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Chronological Donald, Volume Four
overview: In this final volume, our chronicle of Donald's solo-starring shorts wraps up with some of his rarely seen, feather-ruffling adventures from 1951 through 1961. And, for the first time on DVD, Donald's CinemaScope cartoons are presented in their original widescreen format.
title: Walt Disney Treasures - The Chronological Donald, Volume Four
